params.collateralAmount: How much buyer is depositing (rest is credit)

releaseEscrow(uint256).details: For credit-backed: releases collateral immediately, buyer must repay credit portion

repayCreditPortion(uint256).details: Must be called after release to complete the transaction

canRateEscrow(uint256,address).notice: Check if caller can rate an escrow

checkCreditEligibility(address,uint256).notice: Check credit eligibility for a buyer

rateCounterparty(uint256,uint8,string).notice: Rate the other party after escrow completion

repayCreditPortion(uint256).notice: Repay the credit portion of a credit-backed escrow
